headline: ComEd Academy Training Programs Reach More Than 1,000 Served
summary: CHICAGO, April 15, 2025--Today, ComEd and a coalition of community and corporate partners celebrated a new class of 73 graduates from ComEd job training programs, CONSTRUCT Infrastructure Academy and Craft Academy – marking more than 1,000 local residents served by "Academy" job training programming since 2013. Designed to build a skilled and diverse talent pipeline, these free programs prepare job seekers for entry-level positions that lead to rewarding careers in the construction and utility f
